meanings.definition: A vivid description of a work of art.
meanings.sent1: She wrote beautiful ekphrases of the paintings in the museum.
meanings.sent2: The book contained many ekphrases of famous sculptures.
meanings.sent3: Her ekphrases of the artwork made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His ekphrases painted a picture in the reader's mind.
meanings.sent5: The poet's ekphrases brought the art to life.

meanings.definition: The act of describing a work of art in detail.
meanings.sent1: The museum guide's ekphrases were informative and engaging.
meanings.sent2: During the tour, she provided ekphrases of each painting.
meanings.sent3: His exaggerated ekphrases of the artwork made us laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her ekphrases were like a map guiding us through the gallery.
meanings.sent5: The professor's ekphrases were so detailed, it felt like we were there.
